data.name: CYBERSTELLAR
data.detailed_description:
CYBERSTELLAR - Shoot'em Up.

"If you like challenges, then this game is for you!"

First game rendered in 3D Pixel (2D Rendered Voxel). Animations following the example of some animations of some "3D pixel movie".

"Exclusive graphics and unique music make this Shoot 'Em Up Pixels-3D a work of art."

A humble Shoot 'Em Up game:
* 8 beautiful enigmatic levels.
* 4 humble weapon upgrades - 2 of them temporary.
* Beautiful songs.
* Some storms.
* Details such as fog, glass and storms for artistic aesthetics contribute to a pleasing look.

"For those who like to appreciate art, at the same time they play, they also catch a glimpse."

History:

In a distant future, terrestrial civilization managed to make a home on the Planet Mars, and after some time, unexpectedly, a great eclipse and storms between the planets.

In the face of planetary eclipses, in the midst of some storms, alien invasions also occur attacking Planet Earth and Planet Mars.

Earthlings and Martians ask for help; and to help them, the first spacecraft designed for space warfare, called CYBERSTELLAR, enters the picture.

"Attention warrior chosen for this mission! The lives of Earthlings and Martians depend on your effort, but remember, beware of some storms as they can make you lose control over CYBERSTELLAR. Good luck!
I wish you luck!"

(Commandant X)




Note:
Achievements and trading card are planned for the near future.

data.short_description: CYBERSTELLAR - Shoot'em Up. First game rendered in 3D Pixel (2D Rendered Voxel). Animations following the example of some animations of some "3D pixel movie". Protect Earth and Mars from alien attacks, but be careful not to lose control of the ship in the midst of storms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
